author: vmassol
msg: refactored HttpClientHelper in ConnectionHelper + JdkConnectionHelper to allow different implementations of HTTP connection. I plan to move to Commons HttpClient once I know for sure I can wrap a HttpClient HttpMethod object in a HttpURLConnection one (which I have temporarily added in util/ but I plan to donate it to the Commons HttpClient project).
